sqlMap.update: update T_Way_Bill set id=#id# ,way_type=#way_type# ,way_number=#way_number# ,start_city=#start_city# ,end_city=#end_city# ,pass_city=#pass_city# ,deliver_id=#deliver_id# ,consignee_id=#consignee_id# ,clearing_type=#clearing_type# ,spot_payment=#spot_payment# ,pick_payment=#pick_payment# ,back_payment=#back_payment# ,production_payment=#production_payment# ,shipping_type=#shipping_type# ,delivery_type=#delivery_type# ,receipt_portion=#receipt_portion# ,receipt_number=#receipt_number# ,collection_type=#collection_type# ,receive_date=#receive_date# ,bill_rebate=#bill_rebate# ,bill_memo=#bill_memo# ,fee_pay=#fee_pay# ,fee_nopay=#fee_nopay# ,fee_reback=#fee_reback# ,bring_site=#bring_site# ,bring_man=#bring_man# ,back_site=#back_site# ,back_man=#back_man# ,bill_statue=#bill_statue# ,is_hide=#is_hide# ,ticket_taxes=#ticket_taxes# ,freight_chinese=#freight_chinese# ,emp_id=#emp_id# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM T_Way_Bill WHERE id IN(#ids#)
